name: Henry Willy
title: Markets Editor
bio: Henry Willy is our lead Markets Editor with over 12 years of experience covering global stock markets, commodities, and forex. Known for his sharp analysis and timely insights, Henry keeps readers ahead of major market moves.

name: Emma Chen
title: Crypto Editor
bio: Emma Chen is a leading voice in cryptocurrency and blockchain technology. With a background in computer science and finance, she breaks down complex DeFi, Bitcoin, and altcoin trends for our readers.

name: Wade Jenner
title: Billionaires & Wealth Editor
bio: Wade Jenner tracks the world's richest individuals, Forbes lists, net worth changes, luxury deals, and the strategies behind mega-wealth. If it moves the billionaire index — Wade covers it.

name: Mark Blaze
title: Investing Editor
bio: Mark Blaze delivers actionable investing strategies, stock picks, ETF analysis, dividend plays, and portfolio advice. A former hedge fund analyst turned educator, Mark helps readers build real wealth.

name: Jonathan Gill
title: Real Estate Editor
bio: Jonathan Gill covers luxury real estate, commercial property markets, housing trends, REITs, and investment opportunities worldwide. From Manhattan penthouses to emerging markets — he knows the terrain.

name: Gwen John
title: Tech & Finance Editor
bio: Gwen John specializes in the intersection of technology and finance — fintech startups, AI in banking, venture capital deals, digital payments, and the future of money.

name: Marco Anton
title: Economy Editor
bio: Marco Anton delivers expert analysis on GDP, inflation, central bank policy, interest rates, and global economic indicators. His forecasts have been cited by major institutions worldwide.
